body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#37)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#36)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#35)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#34)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#22)
- Update to latest toxvpn revision. @iphydf (#21)
- Update to latest toxvpn revision. @iphydf (#19)
- Use rules_cc instead of native cc_binary rules. @iphydf (#18)
- Mark toxins help tests as "small", i.e. less than 60 seconds. @iphydf (#17)
- Migrate to Camel_Case enum types. @iphydf (#16)
- Add cast-to-void to make ignoring `write`'s result explicit. @iphydf (#15)
- Reduce some warnings-as-errors back to warnings. @iphydf (#13)
- Delete minitox for now. @iphydf (#14)
- Use nanosleep instead of usleep. @iphydf (#12)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#11)
- Make -Wsign-compare not error on toxvpn. @iphydf (#10)
- Add minitox to toxins; add tests for --help. @iphydf (#9)
- Fix argument handling in echobot. @yurivict (#8)
- Add echobot to toxins. @iphydf (#3)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#6)
- Only use libcap on Linux. @iphydf (#2)
- Add BUILD files for bazel and import some more toxins. @iphydf (#1)

## Bug Fixes

- Fix echobot to compile with strict warnings. @iphydf (#29)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Bump toxvpn/import from `278a241` to `5b1215e` @dependabot (#42)
- Update toxvpn submodule. @iphydf (#40)
- Mark most toxins as no-windows. @iphydf (#38)
- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#33)
- Update toxvpn submodule @iphydf (#32)
- Remove travis; add cirrus ci. @iphydf (#28)
- Disable branch builds; only build tags and nightly builds. @iphydf (#27)
- Add restyled config with the same astylerc as toxcore. @iphydf (#25)
- Remove redundant github settings. @iphydf (#26)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Don't stack-allocate Tox_Options. @iphydf (#39)

## Maintenance (Dependencies)

- Bump toxvpn/import from `278a241` to `5b1215e` @dependabot (#42)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Update echobot @nurupo (#20)
name: v0.1.0
